title: Poker Club: Gold Edition
description: The ultimate experience of the most immersive poker simulation ever made.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Welcome to the ultimate experience of the most immersive poker simulation ever made, including:


- Poker Club
- Poker Club: Golden Bundle
- Poker Club: Welcome Bundle


Live the life of a poker pro in the most immersive poker simulation ever seen, with Ultra HD 4K visuals and breathtaking ray tracing. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or brand new to the table, Poker Club: Gold Edition allows you to kick-start your Poker Club career with a massive bankroll of 3,400,000 Poker Chips. Join a community of online players on their way to the top and track your progress in more than 10 Texas Hold’em tournament modes.

<!--image-->
![Poker Club-16cy0](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/560813614bba464385b56f43524d17f0/poker-club-16cy0.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# More ways to play
<!--text-->
Raise your game with over 10 Texas Hold’em tournament modes including freezeouts, shootouts, super-turbos, bounties and more. Play online with the community or create your own custom games and play by your own rules.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Win together
<!--text-->
Join a Club and team up with friends and players from across the world to earn rewards, unlock shared goals and level up your Club.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Become a PCC Poker Tour Pro
<!--text-->
Advance from back-room games to big-money main events as you climb the ranks in the PCC Poker Tour. Customise your pro and play your way to the top.

<!--image-->
![Poker Club-10hhv](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/560813614bba464385b56f43524d17f0/poker-club-10hhv.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Stay connected
<!--text-->
Place your bets in daily online tournaments and take part in exclusive scheduled events to unlock the latest swag.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# As close as it gets to the real thing
<!--text-->
From the low-key basement of Ralph’s Pizzeria to the jaw-dropping Intensity Arena; place your bets in stunning environments delivered in Ultra HD 4K with full ray tracing support.

<!--image-->
![Poker Club-1susw](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/560813614bba464385b56f43524d17f0/poker-club-1susw.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
<!--text-->
**Q: Poker Club has crossplay features, how do I play with my friends who play on Steam?
**
A: It’s simple! When launching the game, select your Steam friends list when the option is displayed on the home screen.

**Q: Where can I find support andthe latest news and updates about all things Poker Club?
**

A: You'll find support and all the latest on the Poker Club [website](https://www.pokerclubgame.com/).

**Q: Where's the best place to stay in the loop with the Poker Club community?
**

A: Join us on [Discord] (https://discord.com/invite/w2xQmwr) where you'll find clubs to join and members to recruit in our friendly Poker Club community.
